Package org.eclipse.jface.databinding.viewers

Class ViewerProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jface.databinding.viewers.ViewerProperties
  • @Deprecated
public class ViewerProperties
extends Object
    Deprecated.
    This class will be removed in a future release. See https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=546822 for more information. It has been replaced by the class ViewerProperties. That class creates typed property objects, while this class creates raw property objects.
    A factory for creating properties of JFace viewers.
    Since:
    1.3
    Restriction:
